author: kiwi.eth
content: Discord voice calls have changed a lot since 2 years

author: kiwi.eth
content: Now you can have priority speakers who make everyone else speaking quieter

author: kiwi.eth
content: You can force push to talk on the chat room

author: kiwi.eth
content: Also, check the voice channel settings and you can increase the bit rate

author: kiwi.eth
content: You can stream a screen to everyone else

author: kiwi.eth
content: But people have to manually join the stream
